org.codehaus.aspectwerkz
Class AspectContext 

   
    java.lang.Object
   
   
   
    org.codehaus.aspectwerkz.AspectContext
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable 
     public final class
     
      AspectContext
extends Object
implements Serializable

Contains information about and for classes that has been defined as cross-cutting.

Author:
Jonas BonŽr
See Also:
